page.title: 03GREAT WITLEY FESTIVAL 1985
page.content: From 16th-19th May, the church was the setting for a flower festival with arrangements depicting a musical theme.Around the churchyard were marquees holding exhibitions of local art & craftwork, including water colours,furniture, buttons,hand spinning,photography and stained glass work.A selection of art work from the local primary school was displayed in the refreshment tent.Various souvenirs were on sale throughout the festival. Choral Evensong was held on Ascension Day with the Choir of Worcester Cathedral and a Festival Evensong was conducted by the Bishop of Worcester on Sunday evening.A festival concert of music for organ and brass was much enjoyed by a large audience followed by cheese and wine. The Faithful City Morris Men entertained visitors on Saturday afternoon.
